description: Due to Labor Day, garbage, recyclable materials and yard trimmings collection will be delayed for unincorporated DeKalb County residents.
title: Labor Day will delay trash pickup in DeKalb
title_page: Labor Day will delay trash pickup in DeKalb
text:
Due to Labor Day, garbage, recyclable materials and yard trimmings collection will be delayed for unincorporated DeKalb County residents.
The new schedule is simple: one day behind all next week.
The Sanitation Division’s administrative office, Central and North Transfer Stations and Seminole Road Landfill will be closed on Monday and will reopen on Tuesday, the county said.
For more information, contact 404-294-2900, sanitation@dekalbcountyga.gov, or visit www.dekalbsanitation.com.
